column1: '''The Lord of the Rings Online Adventure Pack''' is a digital upgrade for [[The Lord of the Rings Online]]. Players who buy the Adventure Pack get two extra character slots<ref name="Source">[http://community.lotro-europe.com/news.php?id=10287&pagename=news&type=news LOTRO europe]</ref> and a new feature: A shared bank storage (with contains 20 slots)<ref name="Source"/>.
